nodes.text: Mitsh was an individual who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Mitsh was part of a small scientific expedition, including Trenrel, Yill'uop, Heitop and Frann, on the planet Talus. When a storm hit the group's area northeast of Dearic, Trenrel found a cave where the group sought shelter. The group decided to investigate further into the cave and set up camp deep in the vast cavern. During their second day in the cave, the group was attacked by giant fynocks and Mitsh was among the first that got killed by the flying creatures.
